Name: Bedroom Blackjack
About the game: Play strip blackjack with some anime cuties to undress them and see their massive honkers or play regular old casino blackjack to win money and purchase unlockable locations, outfits, etc. You met Clara at the beach and she invited you back to her bedroom to play a little blackjack. Just a little harmless fun. Little did you know a whole underground world of strip blackjack was about to open up before you. Play Strip Blackjack and undress sexy anime girls Play classic Casino Blackjack for money with sexy anime girls Unlockable Characters Unlockable Outfits Unlockable Bedrooms Uncensored Nudity Boob Physics Character Dialogue Easy Difficulty - dealers are easier to defeat and a losing hand means dealers put clothes back on. Double Side Bet Purchasable Outfits from the Shop Additional Stripping Animations Purchasable Poses from the Shop Split Side Bet in Casino Mode Hard Difficulty - dealers are better at blackjack and a losing means you remove clothing  Voice Acting Complete Soundtrack Photo Mode
